<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/70981</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>70981</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120760</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120760</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120760</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Valovne fronte v eni  snovi</string>
            <string language="en">Wavefronts on a medium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wavefronts auf einem Medium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fronts des ondes sur un support</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Wavefronts em um media</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fronti d'onda su un media</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κυματομορφές σε ένα μέσο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Frentes de onda en un media</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Valovne fronte v zraku, ki vstopajo v področje z neznanim lomnim količnikom - simulacija svetlobe z delci.</string>
            <string language="en">Visualization of wavefronts passing from the air into unknown medium. Simulation of light as stream of many small particles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">valovna fronta</string>
            <string language="en">wavefront</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lomni količnik</string>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lom svetlobe</string>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtbarmachung der Wavefronts, die von der Luft 
in unbekannten Medium überschreiten. Simulation des Lichtes als
Strom vieler Teilchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visualisation des fronts des ondes passant de 
l'air dans le support inconnu. Simulation de lumière comme jet 
de beaucoup de petites particules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visualization dos wavefronts que passam do ar em 
media desconhecido. Simulação da luz como o córrego de muitas
partículas pequenas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visualizzazione dei fronti d'onda che passano 
dall'aria nel media sconosciuto. Simulazione di luce come flusso
di molte piccole particelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση των κυματομορφών που περνούν από τον αέρα 
στο άγνωστο μέσο. Προσομοίωση του φωτός ως ρεύμα πολλών 
μικρών μορίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visualización de los frentes de onda que pasan 
del aire en media desconocido. Simulación de la luz como 
secuencia de muchas partículas pequeñas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wavefront</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungsindex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">front des ondes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">indice de réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réfraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wavefront</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">deslocamento predeterminado refractive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fronte d'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">indice di rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυματομορφή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαθλαστικό ευρετήριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">frente de onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">índice de refracción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">refracción</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
